item.title: Merge Two Sorted Lists
item.description: Problem Problem_Link{: .btn .btn-green} 1 hour limit no search on internet Merge two sorted linked lists and return it as a sorted list. The list should be made by splicing together the nodes of the first two lists. Example 1: Input: l1 = [1,2,4], l2 = [1,3,4] Output: [1,1,2,3,4,4] Example 2: Input: l1 = [], l2 = [] Output: [] Example 3: Input: l1 = [], l2 = [0] Output: [0] Constraints:
